div.p: If you had 1 million euros, what would you do with it?
If I had 1 million euros, I would do differents things with that.
First, I would like to travel all around the world. I would like to discover other cultures. And I think that we discover ourself thanks to travels Second, I would create my own house.
Thirs i would offer gifts to my family. The hapiness is also something that we share.

These projets are very common. There are only dreams of an ordinary girl who just grow up. I hope that one day i would realize one of this dream. Everyone knows that "live his dreams" is the goal of our live.
